msContents.summary: This manuscript contains the commentary of Nārāyaṇa. The beginning is in Sanskrit, but the rest of the commentary is in Malayalam.

msItem.title: Amarakoṣapañcikā
msItem.author: Nārāyaṇa

msItem.incipit:
kleśādayo yan na parāmṛśāanti yo vā bibharttiś ca śabdam ekaḥ purātanānāḥ gurave gurūṇān tasmai namo
nāgavibhūṣaṇāya · āyurddhanurvvedanikhaṇḍasāgaraṃ vāstugrahāś cāhigajādiśāndhanaṃ smṛtiḥ purāṇānyakhilās sahasraśas samīkṣya vakṣye marakośapa
ñcikāṃ | ko marttyo marakośas tu vivarītuṃ kṣamo bhuvi ko vābdhīmathanaṃ karttuṃ śakto nārāyaṇādṛte | tatra ye svena vivṛtā ye ca vyaktārtthavācinaḥ
